pkgmetadata.longdescription: Estimates the Intraclass Correlation Coefficient for Trajectory Data // Estimates the intraclass correlation coefficient for trajectory data using a matrix of distances between trajectories. The distances implemented are the extended Hausdorff distances (Min et al. 2007) doi:10.1080/13658810601073315 and the discrete Frchet distance (Magdy et al. 2015) doi:10.1109/IntelCIS.2015.7397286.
